meanings.definition: relating to or characterized by the production of ketones
meanings.sent1: The ketogenic diet focuses on producing ketones for energy.
meanings.sent2: Her doctor recommended a ketogenic meal plan to increase ketone levels.
meanings.sent3: The ketogenic snacks were so popular that they sold out quickly.
meanings.sent4: In the ketogenic world, ketones are like little energy boosters.
meanings.sent5: The ketogenic process is all about creating ketones efficiently.

meanings.definition: promoting the production of ketones in the body
meanings.sent1: Eating high-fat foods can be ketogenic and help with ketone production.
meanings.sent2: The ketogenic supplements she took were designed to boost ketone levels.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his love for bacon was purely ketogenic.
meanings.sent4: The gym routine was so intense, it felt like a ketogenic workout for ketone production.
meanings.sent5: The ketogenic lifestyle is all about encouraging the body to make more ketones.

meanings.definition: a diet that promotes the production of ketones in the body
meanings.sent1: She followed a strict ketogenic to maintain ketosis.
meanings.sent2: The ketogenic included plenty of healthy fats to support ketone production.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was amazed by her dedication to the ketogenic.
meanings.sent4: The ketogenic became his go-to choice for managing weight and ketone levels.
meanings.sent5: Preparing meals for a ketogenic requires careful planning and ketone awareness.
